project_plan.name: Random Password Generator Script
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password, incorporating uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. The length of the password should be configurable by the user.

task.name: Allow user input for password length
Implement inclusion of uppercase letters in the password
Implement inclusion of lowercase letters in the password
Implement inclusion of numbers in the password
Implement inclusion of special characters in the password
Write tests for the password generation functionality
Execute tests on the password generation functionality to ensure it works correctly
